Greenwise.background_description: You delve deep into the Wood, prying its secrets from between rough boughs and whispering leaves. To this verdant kingdom, you are no mere scholar but its confidant as well.

starting_gear.name: Twine Bauble
starting_gear.description: Ward: A silver circle 50ft across appears on the ground. Choose one species that cannot cross it.

table1.question: How has the Wood failed you?

options.description: An ill-tempered forest spirit cursed you for stealing, marking you as an enemy of their kind. Take a Bezoar Stone. Ingesting it cures any poison (1 use, unless retrieved).

items.name: Bezoar Stone
items.description: Ingesting it cures any poison (1 use, unless retrieved).

options.description: A close friend disappeared into the forest. Now you see their face in any tea you brew. Take a Soporific Concoction (3 uses).
You were poisoned, losing your sense of taste and smell. You can now withstand noxious fumes and always carry Antitoxin (2 uses).
Your radical experiments turned your skin green, and you now gain nourishment as a plant. You don't need Rations, but a day without sufficient sunlight and water leaves you deprived.
Your impressive corpseflower won a local contest then promptly killed a judge. You fled, but not without the Prize Money (100gp) and a warrant for your arrest.
You created a restorative tincture that also causes accidental infertility. Take a Healing Potion that completely restores STR. Only you know of its unintended side-effects.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: Completely restores STR. Only you know of its unintended side-effects.

table2.question: What keeps you safe while in the Wood?

options.description: Amadou: A vermilion fungus that catches fire quite easily. 3 uses.

items.name: Amadou
items.description: A vermilion fungus that catches fire quite easily.

options.description: Delphinium: Breathe water for up to one hour. 1 use, but can be divided into fractional doses.

items.name: Delphinium
items.description: Breathe water for up to one hour. Can be divided into fractional doses.

options.description: Tacky Stalk: A woody reed that hardens into a permanent adhesive when chewed. 2 uses.

items.name: Tacky Stalk
items.description: A woody reed that hardens into a permanent adhesive when chewed.

options.description: Wisp Lantern: Caged in wrought iron, provides a dim light so long as the wisp is able to feed on nearby pain and fear.

items.name: Wisp Lantern
items.description: Provides a dim light so long as the wisp is able to feed on nearby pain and fear.

options.description: Seed Bomb: A canvas sack filled with seeds that explode on impact. d6 damage (blast, 3 uses).

items.name: Seed Bomb
items.description: A canvas sack filled with seeds that explode on impact. d6 damage (blast, 3 uses).

options.description: Briarvine: Entangles any creature up to horse size (STR to break free). Reusable.

items.name: Briarvine
items.description: Entangles any creature up to horse size (STR to break free). Reusable.
